content: हेला [हेड्-भावे-डस्य लः] {@--1@} Contempt, disrespect, insult; <ls>Śi. 12. 72.</ls> {@--2@} ({%a%}) Amorous sport or dalliance, wanton sport; <ls>S. D. 128</ls>; <ls>D. R. 2. 32.</ls> ({%b%}) Pleasure, delight, pastime; <ls>Māl. 9. 43.</ls> {@--3@} Strong sexual desire; प्रौढेच्छयाऽतिरूढानां नारीणां सुरतोत्सवे . शृंगारशास्त्रतत्वज्ञैर्हेला सा परिकीर्तिता .. {@--4@} Ease, facility; <ls>Śi. 1. 34</ls>; हेलया ‘easily’, without any difficulty or trouble. {@--5@} Moonlight. {@--6@} A pause in a note or shaking (as in music).
